quest.name: The Dormant Dhyata
journal: Rurusha is raring to get started.

Rurusha has tasked you with crafting gold plating for the relic.

â€»Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 110. Delivering items with a rating of 220 or more will earn greater rewards.
You deliver the sets of gold plating to Rurusha. With the relic's exterior sorted out, she asks that you let her know when you are up to the task of working on its insides.
objectives: Deliver the sets of gold plating to Rurusha.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Ah, hello again, Forename. Are you ready to begin?

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Wonderful to hear! I'd like you to start by crafting gold plating. You needn't worry about fitting it to the relic, though. I will handle that.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may now undertake deliveries for the Faculty of Archaeology at the Studium. By delivering the requested items to Rurusha and raising yourself in her esteem, you can advance the story of her efforts to restore the relic.

dialogue.name: BORIC
dialogue.text: You know, there's lots of unsavory characters out there who make a living stealing relics made of silver and gold from archaeological sites, selling them on to art dealers and collectors... How much do you suppose the Golden Dhyata is worth?

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Pray, let me know when you've made the plating.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Great work! I can't wait to spruce up the old girl.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Great work! I can see you're a fine craftswomancraftsman indeed. Thank the gods for sending you our way.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Rurusha's trust.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the items Rurusha needs, and deliver them often to improve your standing with the Faculty of Archaeology!

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Truly, splendid work. Our little friend is looking much better already.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: <sniff> Oh, it feels like watching my own child growing up. That you are here to help means more than you know.

dialogue.name: BORIC
dialogue.text: I am glad to see you in such high spirits, Professor. Truly, I am. But is it really wise for us to use the entirety of our remaining budget on this project?

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Oh, Boric. Lighten up! Have I ever steered you wrong in the past?

dialogue.name: BORIC
dialogue.text: Well, I suppose not... Even so, you must forgive me if I feel uneasy seeing our coffers so thoroughly emptied.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Better that the money is used than left to gather dust, I say.

dialogue.name: BORIC
dialogue.text: While I do agree that being miserly serves little purpose, the opposite extreme may not be the best approach.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Well, there's no need for you to fret, Forename. I have set aside more than enough scrips to see you duly compensated for your efforts.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: But enough talk of boring old financial matters. I believe it is time for us to start work on our little friend's insides!

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: However, know that this will be an altogether more difficult process than reinforcing its exterior. Let me know when you feel up to the task.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Rurusha is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a Rookie Relic Restorer!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next request will be available from Rurusha upon reaching level 83 as a blacksmith, armorer, or goldsmith.
